name: Hoop Shot VR
description: Experience Basket Ball from the comfort of your own room. Shoot hoops, score and challenge yourself all day long in this arcade styled game all in VR.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer Processor: Intel Core i5 3570 or Better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or Better, R9 290 or Better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 7700k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060, R9 290 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
